name: SpaceShooter (Th3Dilli)
description:
Gameplay:

Try to shoot as many enemies as you can. Enemies will spawn slow at the beginning and faster the further you progress. 

Along the way power-ups will spawn.

The green power-ups will increase your firerate by 5% and the purple ones by 10%.

Further you can change your fire mode [L key]  from single to double and double V shaped.

Keys:

  • movement - W A S D, or Arrow Keys
  • shooting - Space, Enter
  • change fire mode - L

Enjoy

Source code:

https://gitlab.com/Th3Dilli_GameDev/spaceshooter
